remark.p: Eastern Europe Division, Bureau of Intelligence and Research, Department of State, until July 1974; Deputy Director, Operations Center, Office of the Secretariat Staff, Department of State, from July 1974 until June 1975; Director, Operations Center, Office of the Secretariat Staff, Department of State, from June 1975 until July 1976; Political Officer, Political Section, U.S. Embassy in Rome, from July 1976
